fields.label: Make images greyscale?
fields.name: rsm_recognition_greyscale

fields.label: Favicon Generator
fields.message: To save lots of time and effort, install this convenient favicon generator: Favicon by RealFaviconGenerator Once installed, go to Appearance > Favicon to configure

fields.label: Logo image - Retina Display
fields.name: rsm_logo_image_retina
fields.instructions: NOTE: This image will be automatically reduced to 50% of it's size to achieve retina display. Also, if this is set, it will automatically override the use of the standard logo.

fields.label: Use SVG Logo?
fields.name: rsm_use_svg_logo
fields.instructions: SVG files may need to be uploaded directly to your uploads folder for security reasons. **Checking this box will override any use of the Logo Images or Text above.

fields.label: SVG Code
fields.name: rsm_logo_svg_code
fields.instructions: Copy and paste your <svg> code here

fields.label: Logo Max Width
fields.name: rsm_logo_max_width
fields.instructions: To avoid any distortion with a RASTERIZED image (not SVG), it should match the true width of the STANDARD (non-retina) logo image. Any number is fine for SVG.

fields.label: Use text only (no logo)
fields.name: rsm_use_text_only
fields.instructions: If checked, the site title will be used instead of the logo image.

fields.label: Logo SEO settings for Homepage
fields.name: rsm_logo_seo_settings
fields.instructions: Determine if the Homepage logo or tagline should be wrapped as an H1

fields.label: Header Logo Shortcode
fields.message:
Add the logo to your theme template using this shortcode:
[rsm_header_logo]
*DEVELOPERS NOTE: This shortcode function depends on the various field names set in the Options tab. Don't change them unless you know what you're doing!

If You want to override the markup of this template, you can copy the file from /plugins/_rsm_core/templates/rsm-header-logo.php, create a new folder named rsm-templates in your theme, and paste the file in there (using the same filename).

fields.label: Setup fullwidth masthead for this page?
fields.name: rsm_page_use_fullwidth_masthead
fields.instructions:
NOTE: there is a global setting for this masthead display in options > theme settings.

If this is turned on here, the H1 tag of this page will be moved to the masthead section and you can customize the individual settings for this page.

fields.label: Use this page's title for the masthead title?
fields.name: rsm_page_use_default_page_title

fields.label: Custom Masthead Title
fields.name: rsm_page_custom_masthead_title
fields.instructions: You may want to use a more compelling title in some situations, instead of "About Us" or "Contact" (This won’t replace the <H1> of the page — that will still be the page title for SEO purposes).

fields.label: Use H1 tag for masthead title
fields.name: rsm_page_h1_tag_masthead_title
fields.instructions: Default is YES

fields.label: ATTENTION
fields.message: You've chosen not to use the H1 tag for this masthead title. This page's default title will be used as the H1 instead to ensure there is one readable by search engines. This default title will be accessible for screen-readers, but not visible to website users.

fields.label: Hide masthead title
fields.name: rsm_page_hide_masthead_title
fields.instructions: Don't display the masthead title at all. (It will still be visible to screen-readers for accessibility purposes.)

fields.label: Masthead Title alignment
fields.name: rsm_page_masthead_title_alignment
fields.instructions: NOTE: This will override the global masthead title alignment (if set in options > theme settings > masthead.)

fields.label: Content above masthead title
fields.name: rsm_page_masthead_surtitle
fields.instructions: HTML is allowed

fields.label: Masthead Image
fields.name: rsm_page_masthead_image
fields.instructions: If this is not set, the "featured image" of this page will be used.

fields.label: Don't use image
fields.name: ram_page_no_masthead_image
fields.instructions: Don't use image at all. This will fallback to the setting a color in the theme's CSS.

fields.label: Custom Page Class
fields.name: custom_page_class
fields.instructions: Add a custom class to the <body> tag

fields.label: Add No Index, No Follow meta tag?
fields.name: custom_robots
fields.instructions: Check this if you want search engines to AVOID indexing this page.

fields.label: Credit / Copyright Line

Use the %the_year% tag to display the current year in your credit line.
Use the %site_name% tag to display this site's name.
fields.default_value: © %the_year% Copyright. All Rights Reserved. Trades Marketing Websites Canada

If You want to override the markup of this template, you can copy the file from /plugins/_rsm_core/templates/rsm-header-logo.php, create a new folder named rsm-templates in your theme, and paste the file in there (using the same filename).

fields.instructions: REQUIRED.

fields.instructions: REQUIRED.

fields.name: schema_logo
fields.instructions: REQUIRED.

fields.label: image
fields.name: schema_image
fields.instructions: REQUIRED. Can be an image of the business of just the logo again.

fields.label: priceRange
fields.name: schema_pricerange
fields.instructions:
REQUIRED. The price range can be represented by dollar signs: $
If the price of your service is $99, use $$.
If the price is $999, use $$$.

fields.label: Primary Address Shortcode
fields.message:
You can use one of this shortcode to display the primary address (in schema format) within the wordpress content.
[rsm_primary_address]
*DEVELOPERS NOTE: This shortcode function depends on the various field names to populate the data. Don't change them!

fields.label: IMPORTANT!
fields.message: You can setup a custom Google Map here if you have an API key for this domain. Use your Google Maps API key here to display a dynamic Google map and location marker. Create an API key in the Google API Console. Read more documentation

fields.label: Google Map JS API Key
fields.name: google_map_api_key
fields.instructions: Find or create your API key in the Google Console, here. Instructions on creating an API key, here.

fields.label: Google Map Theme Style
fields.name: google_map_theme_style
fields.instructions: You can create custom colour schemes for the Google map. Go here to find/create and paste the code here.

fields.label: Google Map Zoom Level
fields.name: google_map_zoom
fields.instructions:
Pick a number between 8 and 15 (the higher the number, the closer the zoom).
You can experiment with other numbers but this is a good range. (Default: 12).

fields.label: Google Map Location Marker -- LATITUDE
fields.name: google_map_lat
fields.instructions: Enter the location latitude here. Find the coordinates of your address here

fields.label: Google Map Location Marker -- LONGITUDE
fields.name: google_map_long
fields.instructions: Enter the location longitude here. Find the coordinates of your address here

fields.label: Show Map Marker?
fields.name: google_map_show_marker
fields.instructions:
If this is disabled, the map will use the location coordinates as the
center point intead of showing the marker on the map.

fields.label: Map Shortcode
fields.message:
You can use this shortcode to display the Google Map within the wordpress content.
[rsm_google_map]
*DEVELOPERS NOTE: This shortcode function depends on various field names. Don't change them!

fields.label: Activate Maintenance Mode
fields.name: maintenance_mode
fields.instructions: If checked, the themes 503.php file will be used for any user who isn't logged in.
